properties.name: hookrouter.platforms
properties.description: Platform registry. Each key is a platform id and contains endpoints keyed by webhook id.

properties.name: hookrouter.type-mappings
properties.description: Highest-priority routing map keyed by notification type id.

properties.name: hookrouter.category-mappings
properties.description: Second-priority routing map keyed by notification category.

properties.name: hookrouter.default-mappings
properties.description: Fallback routes when type/category mappings do not match.

properties.name: hookrouter.retry.enabled
properties.description: Enable retry for webhook delivery.

properties.name: hookrouter.retry.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum retry attempts. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.retry.initial-delay
properties.description: Initial retry delay in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.retry.max-delay
properties.description: Maximum retry delay in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0 and >= initial-delay.

properties.name: hookrouter.retry.multiplier
properties.description: Exponential backoff multiplier. Must be >= 1.0.

properties.name: hookrouter.retry.jitter-factor
properties.description: Jitter factor in [0.0, 1.0].

properties.name: hookrouter.timeout.enabled
properties.description: Enable timeout guard for webhook delivery.

properties.name: hookrouter.timeout.duration
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.circuit-breaker.enabled
properties.description: Enable circuit breaker protection.

properties.name: hookrouter.circuit-breaker.failure-threshold
properties.description: Sliding failure count threshold. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.circuit-breaker.failure-rate-threshold
properties.description: Failure rate threshold percentage in (0, 100].

properties.name: hookrouter.circuit-breaker.wait-duration
properties.description: Open-state wait duration in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.circuit-breaker.success-threshold
properties.description: Required successful calls in half-open state. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.rate-limiter.enabled
properties.description: Enable rate limiting.

properties.name: hookrouter.rate-limiter.limit-for-period
properties.description: Permits per refresh period. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.rate-limiter.limit-refresh-period
properties.description: Refresh period in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.rate-limiter.timeout-duration
properties.description: Permit acquisition timeout in milliseconds. Must be >= 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.bulkhead.enabled
properties.description: Enable bulkhead isolation.

properties.name: hookrouter.bulkhead.max-concurrent-calls
properties.description: Maximum concurrent calls. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.bulkhead.max-wait-duration
properties.description: Bulkhead wait duration in milliseconds. Must be >= 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.dead-letter.enabled
properties.description: Enable dead-letter queue processing.

properties.name: hookrouter.dead-letter.max-retries
properties.description: Maximum reprocessing retries before dropping or parking events.

properties.name: hookrouter.dead-letter.scheduler-enabled
properties.description: Enable scheduled dead-letter draining.

properties.name: hookrouter.dead-letter.scheduler-interval
properties.description: Scheduler interval in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.dead-letter.scheduler-batch-size
properties.description: Maximum items processed per schedule run. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.async.core-pool-size
properties.description: Async executor core pool size. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.async.max-pool-size
properties.description: Async executor max pool size. Must be greater than 0 and >= core-pool-size.

properties.name: hookrouter.async.queue-capacity
properties.description: Async executor queue capacity. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: hookrouter.async.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Thread name prefix for the async executor. Must not be blank.

properties.name: hookrouter.async.await-termination-seconds
properties.description: Shutdown await timeout in seconds. Must be >= 0.
